https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wSo6KghPxWTzudWR83PCazhtlOY.jpg Eidak is a 17-year-old shepherd who's fed up of life in his dustbowl village in Iran and wants to escape to the United Arab Emirates. After his father is killed in a construction site accident, though, Eidak finds himself drawn into a cycle of revenge and despair that threatens to scupper his plans of escape. Behesht ja-ye digari ast
